title: Neo-grotesque or Humanist.
content:
Would someone give me their opinion about this typeface? [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-n/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181519/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-n/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-n/")

The description says "ne0-grotesque" but to me it feels a lot like Frutiger of Myriad, except for a few characters like the 'y.' A few of the terminals are almost vertical, but most end at a bit of an angle, especially in the heavier weights.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181519im_/http:/typophile.com/files/temp_3548.jpg)
author: paullawrence
